doc.field: Cross & Brown Company architectural photograph collection
Cross & Brown Company architectural photograph collection

Series II is divided into three subseries: Manhattan Properties, New York State Properties, and Cross & Brown Company photographs. The first two series span the years from the early 1970s until the beginning of the 1990s, while company photographs date exclusively from the 1980s. Manhattan properties are arranged alphabetically by street, followed numerically by numbered avenues and then numbered streets. New York State Properties are arranged alphabetically by town (or borough). As in Series I, buildings in New York City's outer boroughs are filed under New York State. Cross & Brown Company photographs are filed by name of individual or event, as in Series I.
Cross & Brown Company architectural photograph collection
